subject: Boxing
lead_paragraph: Shane Mosley dominated from start to finish Saturday night, scoring a technical knockout of Antonio Margarito 43 seconds into the ninth round to win the World Boxing Association welterweight title in a stunning upset in Los Angeles.
snippet: Shane Mosley dominated from start to finish Saturday night, scoring a technical knockout of Antonio Margarito 43 seconds into the ninth round to win the World Boxing Association welterweight title in a stunning upset in Los Angeles.
